testcase.name: Verify is user is able to navigate to Deals Page from the Home Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged into the application and is on the Home Page...........passed When User clicks on Deals from the Menu option.............................passed Then User is navigated to Deals page........................................passed

testcase.name: Verify if user is able to Create New Deals - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged into the application and is on the Home Page...........passed When User clicks on New Deals from the Deals menu...........................passed Then User enters new deals details Lindt, Meeka,8-8-2025....................passed

testcase.name: Verify if user is able to Create New Deals - #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged into the application and is on the Home Page...........passed When User clicks on New Deals from the Deals menu...........................passed Then User enters new deals details Telas, Ben,11-11-2025....................passed

testcase.name: Verify deals that are closed
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged into the application and is on the Home Page...........passed When User clicks on Full Form Search from Deals menu option.................passed And User clicks on Closed Status radio button...............................passed And User clicks on Search Deals button......................................passed Then All the Closed deals are displayed.....................................passed
